rows.label: qst106001_0010
rows.name: What's wrong, Dad? Tummy hurts, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0020
rows.name: Huh? Oh, it's you, Tora, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0030
rows.name: My stomach's fine, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0040
rows.name:
Masterpon always eats well,
sleeps well, and poops well, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0050
rows.name: That's right, I'm in perfect health, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0060
rows.name:
That information is totally unnecessary,
mo. So, what were you groaning about, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0070
rows.name: Hm? Oh, that... mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0080
rows.name:
I was contemplating a
new mode for Hana, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0090
rows.name:
Mo-mo! Was Dad thinking the
same thing as Tora, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0100
rows.name:
Tora was actually thinking it's
about time to power up Hana, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0110
rows.name: What? You too, Tora, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0120
rows.name:
As expected of my son,
we think alike, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0130
rows.name:
So, what kind of mode was
Dad thinking of, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0140
rows.name:
Curious, mo? Can't be helped. I'll
give you a special look, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0150
rows.name: This is Hana's final mode, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0160
rows.name: Th-This is...

rows.label: qst106001_0170
rows.name:
What do you think, mo? So
amazing you're speechless, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0180
rows.name: It's called Super Fighter Mode.

rows.label: qst106001_0190
rows.name:
This Hana is ten times the size of Kiku, a valkyrie
that surpasses even a Divine Beast warship, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0200
rows.name: What are you thinking, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0210
rows.name:
Isn't this just an enlarged
copy of Hana's blueprint, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0220
rows.name:
Your ideas are on the same
level as Bahn's, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0230
rows.name:
What, you don't like
big things, Tora, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0240
rows.name: Then how about this, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0250
rows.name:
Hm? What is it, mo? It's too
small, I can't see it well, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0260
rows.name:
This is Hana compacted down to
an extremely small size, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0270
rows.name:
What do you mean, extremely small, mo?
Isn't this just a shrunken blueprint, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0280
rows.name:
Besides, if she's this small,
she'll be useless, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0290
rows.name:
No, no, at this ant-like size,
she can infiltrate anywhere.

rows.label: qst106001_0300
rows.name:
And her power is the same as
before. This is truly an...

rows.label: qst106001_0310
rows.name:
Dad... any further than this would
be problematic, so let's stop, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0320
rows.name: Hmm... This isn't good either, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0330
rows.name: Just what do you like, Tora, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0340
rows.name: Want to know, mo? Want to know, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0350
rows.name: Can't be helped. I'll tell you, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0360
rows.name: What Tora is thinking of is... JD Mode.

rows.label: qst106001_0370
rows.name: JD Mode?

rows.label: qst106001_0380
rows.name: That's right, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0390
rows.name:
This new Hana will aim to be an
even more mature, adult woman, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0400
rows.name: This is a man's romance, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0410
rows.name:
Mmm... I don't know what
JD stands for, but...

rows.label: qst106001_0420
rows.name:
...Tora's extraordinary enthusiasm is
coming through loud and clear, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0430
rows.name: You get it, Dad, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0440
rows.name: Yes, I understand, my son, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0450
rows.name:
Alright, I'll start on the design
immediately, mo. Kiku, prepare.

rows.label: qst106001_0460
rows.name: Understood, Masterpon, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0470
rows.name: Listen up, Hana, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0480
rows.name:
Tora and Dad will be holed up in
the back room for a while, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0490
rows.name:
Don't let anyone near the
room until we come out, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0500
rows.name: Understood, Master, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0510
rows.name: What's Tora planning to do?

rows.label: qst106001_0520
rows.name: Who knows...

rows.label: qst106001_0530
rows.name:
I heard them say they're
going to power up Hana-chan.

rows.label: qst106001_0540
rows.name:
"Adult and mature"... Sounds as redundant
as sayin' your "headache hurts your head."

rows.label: qst106001_0550
rows.name: You're one to talk.

rows.label: qst106001_0560
rows.name: Huh? What's that supposed to mean?

rows.label: qst106001_0570
rows.name: Wow, he really doesn't realize.

rows.label: qst106001_0580
rows.name:
Powering up... Does that mean
they're modifying Hana?

rows.label: qst106001_0590
rows.name: Maybe.

rows.label: qst106001_0600
rows.name:
But from the looks of it, they
won't be coming out for a while.

rows.label: qst106001_0610
rows.name:
Can't be helped. Let's go back
to the inn and get some rest.

rows.label: qst106001_0620
rows.name: What? They're still at it?

rows.label: qst106001_0630
rows.name: Yes, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0640
rows.name:
They've been working nonstop since
yesterday without eating or sleeping, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0650
rows.name: Hey, there's a limit to everything.

rows.label: qst106001_0660
rows.name:
If they don't take it easy,
they're going to collapse.

rows.label: qst106001_0670
rows.name: Mngh...

rows.label: qst106001_0680
rows.name: Ojousama!

rows.label: qst106001_0690
rows.name:
It's done, mo. It's
finally complete, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0700
rows.name:
Complete...? Tora, what
did you complete?

rows.label: qst106001_0710
rows.name: Mo-ho-ho...

rows.label: qst106001_0720
rows.name: Look... at this, mo!

rows.label: qst106001_0730
rows.name: Ooh...

rows.label: qst106001_0740
rows.name: This is... Hana's final form, mo!

rows.label: qst106001_0750
rows.name: O-Ojousama, compose yourself!

rows.label: qst106001_0760
rows.name: Mgyah...

rows.label: qst106001_0770
rows.name: T-Tora... is this really okay, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0780
rows.name:
That's a bit too adult... It
might be too early for kids, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0790
rows.name: I don't care, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0800
rows.name:
Tora has made the decision to climb
the stairs to adulthood, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0810
rows.name:
I see... So you're really
going to do this, mo?

rows.label: qst106001_0820
rows.name:
Dad, Tora never goes
back on his word, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0830
rows.name:
A real man stakes his
life on his romance, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0840
rows.name: Well said, my son, mo.

rows.label: qst106001_0860
rows.name: Ugh...

rows.label: qst106001_0870
rows.name: Enough already... Move!!

rows.label: qst106001_0880
rows.name: Mo-mo!
